column4: Here is the info on mounting NTFS and FAT32:  NTFS = "mount -t ntfs-3g /dev/sda1 /media/windisk -o force   FAT32 = "mount -t vfat -o umask=000 /dev/sda1 /media/disk" (of course change with your real drive names)
I'm banned from #linuxmint-chat and their others
I was going to try tor to override it
how would you override a ban?
